explains: vt. 把……做得过分；使过于疲劳；对……表演过火；夸张
vi. 做得过分；表演过火

sentences.en: It is important never to overdo new exercises.
sentences.cn: 重要的是，千万不要过度进行一项新的锻炼。

sentences.en: It's important to study hard, but don't overdo it.
sentences.cn: 刻苦学习很重要，但不要超过极限。

sentences.en: Rest in between times an' take deep breaths an' don't overdo.
sentences.cn: 做一会儿就休息一下，深呼吸，不要过度。
